rainbow-solstice-2024.title: Rainbow Solstice
rainbow-solstice-2024.description: We're going BIG for pride! And partnering with some neighborhood cultural gems. It'll be a classic South Philly block party. It'll be queer-focused...artists, non-profits, LGBTQ+ businesses, entertainment, food/drink, you name it...(and feel free to add your own ideas or connect us with those who might wanna be part of it)!
rainbow-solstice-2024.note: In Partnership with Bella Vista Neighbors Association, Fleisher Art Memorial, & Da Vinci Art Alliance. For sponsorship, vending and volunteer opportunities please contact us on our social media.
